row.name: JOBI.CREATE.VARA.VM
row.description: Create a VM VARA for Jason

row.process: !:set &RET# = remove_object(&VARA_NAME#) :set &VARA_KEY# = 1 :set &RET# = create_object(VARA,&VARA_NAME#,TEMP) !:put_var &VARA_NAME#,&VARA_KEY#,"id","<id_openstack>" :put_var &VARA_NAME#,&VARA_KEY#,"id","<id_openstack>",'{"virtualMachine" : {',"," :set &VARA_KEY# = &VARA_KEY# + 1 :put_var &VARA_NAME#,&VARA_KEY#,"name","<nom_openstack>",,"," :set &VARA_KEY# = &VARA_KEY# + 1 :put_var &VARA_NAME#,&VARA_KEY#,"status", "En service",,"," :set &VARA_KEY# = &VARA_KEY# + 1 :put_var &VARA_NAME#,&VARA_KEY#,"description", "VM banane",,"," :set &VARA_KEY# = &VARA_KEY# + 1 :put_var &VARA_NAME#,&VARA_KEY#,"dns", "banane.thales.fr",,"," :set &VARA_KEY# = &VARA_KEY# + 1 :put_var &VARA_NAME#,&VARA_KEY#,"startDate","20111117000000",,"," :set &VARA_KEY# = &VARA_KEY# + 1 :put_var &VARA_NAME#,&VARA_KEY#,"installationDate","20111117000000",,"," :set &VARA_KEY# = &VARA_KEY# + 1 ! OS :put_var &VARA_NAME#,&VARA_KEY#,"id","<id_CCM_SOF-xxxxxxxx>",'"os": {',"}," :set &VARA_KEY# = &VARA_KEY# + 1 ! SLA :put_var &VARA_NAME#,&VARA_KEY#,"id","<id_CCM_SVC-xxxxxxxx>",'"sla": {',"}," :set &VARA_KEY# = &VARA_KEY# + 1 :put_var &VARA_NAME#,&VARA_KEY#,"used","2",'"vpu": {',"," :set &VARA_KEY# = &VARA_KEY# + 1 :put_var &VARA_NAME#,&VARA_KEY#,"frequency","2394",,"}," :set &VARA_KEY# = &VARA_KEY# + 1 :put_var &VARA_NAME#,&VARA_KEY#,"used", "12000",'"VMemory":{',"," :set &VARA_KEY# = &VARA_KEY# + 1 :put_var &VARA_NAME#,&VARA_KEY#,"allocated", "12288",,"}}}"
